title: Bloody Machete
summaries: The Bloody Machete is a rare and unique boomerang-type weapon that has a 1/2000 (0.05%) chance of being dropped by any weak enemy during the Halloween seasonal event. When thrown, as it falls downward after reaching a maximum range, and returns to the thrower upon impacting a block or enemy. Its physics are similar to the Magic Dagger, but it must return to the player before being thrown again. It inflicts melee damage, rather than magic or ranged damage.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.

statistics.Damage: 20 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 15 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Melee)
statistics.Sell: 1 GC
